title: Lbridges3001
author: Lbridges3001
content: Hi, I'm looking to borrow 0.0054 BTC and I'm willing to pay 0.0060 in return in a week. Here's my BTC wallet: bc1qf87309gn2gne85tf5wq5u4vy755hws5y6jkead

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Quote from: Lbridges3001 on May 26, 2023, 01:35:37 PMHi, I'm looking to borrow 0.0054 BTC and I'm willing to pay 0.0060 in return in a week. Here's my BTC wallet: bc1qf87309gn2gne85tf5wq5u4vy755hws5y6jkeadWhere is the collateral part?

comments.author: Lbridges3001
comments.body: I'm not familiar with the collateral part - could you explain and I'll address.

comments.author: gordonics.com
comments.body: You have zero credibility as a new user (like me for that matter). So as a guarantee you should offer an asset that exceeds the value of the loan you ask for.

comments.author: Lbridges3001
comments.body: Quote from: gordonics.com on May 26, 2023, 02:39:41 PMYou have zero credibility as a new user (like me for that matter). So as a guarantee you should offer an asset that exceeds the value of the loan you ask for.Collateral in regards to another form of crypto? I have personal collateral.

comments.author: gordonics.com
comments.body: It has to be something you can deliver to your lender.Material property is difficult to entrust unless you live nearby.For this reason, other crypto coins are usually used as a guarantee deposit to be delivered online to the lender.

comments.author: gordonics.com
comments.body: More information in the top post of this section:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=577765.0

comments.author: Lbridges3001
comments.body: Quote from: gordonics.com on May 26, 2023, 02:52:32 PMIt has to be something you can deliver to your lender.Material property is difficult to entrust unless you live nearby.For this reason, other crypto coins are usually used as a guarantee deposit to be delivered online to the lender.Understood! Greatly appreciated. I'll look into this.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: You have to leave something of high liquidity for the lender so that he can sell it off to recover the money in case you default the loan. Just like you would go to the bank and ask for a loan, you have to provide collateral.I am sure you know how the internet is filled with scammers so, no-collateral loans for a user without even reputation is a no-go zone for the lenders

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Didn't I see you getting turned down by shasan only a day or two ago?

comments.author: Lbridges3001
comments.created_time: May 27, 2023, 11:26:57 AMLast edit: May 27, 2023, 01:04:46 PM by Mr. Big
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 26, 2023, 11:54:48 PMYou have to leave something of high liquidity for the lender so that he can sell it off to recover the money in case you default the loan. Just like you would go to the bank and ask for a loan, you have to provide collateral.I am sure you know how the internet is filled with scammers so, no-collateral loans for a user without even reputation is a no-go zone for the lendersUnderstood. I'm new on here so I don't know how things work. I'm still learning. Quote from: Timelord2067 on May 27, 2023, 10:50:58 AMDidn't I see you getting turned down by shasan only a day or two ago?Yes, he didn't give me a reason or anything. I didn't know Shasan was the only lender on here. Also, the people responding has given me some insight on what it is I need to do when asking for a loan. If you saw that he rejected my request, surely you saw my follow-up question that was never answered. Thanks

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on May 22, 2023, 08:23:50 PMQuote from: Lbridges3001 on May 22, 2023, 02:30:09 PMLoan Amount: 0.0088 BTCLoan Purpose: Personal Loan Repay Amount: whatever is requiredLoan Repay Date: 5/26/2023Type of Collateral: NoneEscrow profile Link: NoneBitcoin Address: bc1qf87309gn2gne85tf5wq5u4vy755hws5y6jkeadRejected, sorry.Quote from: Lbridges3001 on May 27, 2023, 11:34:19 AMQuote from: Timelord2067 on May 27, 2023, 10:50:58 AMDidn't I see you getting turned down by shasan only a day or two ago?Yes, he didn't give me a reason or anything. I didn't know Shasan was the only lender on here. Also, the people responding has given me some insight on what it is I need to do when asking for a loan. If you saw that he rejected my request, surely you saw my follow-up question that was never answered. Thanks So you thought you'd ask three more times in as many days *after* being told no to your first post?I wouldn't lend you anything either with that kind of temperament.Quote from: Lbridges3001 on May 26, 2023, 01:47:30 PMI try not to bet against or with my team. It's just something that makes me feel as if I'm being janky or something. And looky here - your only NON lending post ever is in the gambling section.

comments.author: Lbridges3001
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on May 27, 2023, 12:37:00 PMQuote from: shasan on May 22, 2023, 08:23:50 PMQuote from: Lbridges3001 on May 22, 2023, 02:30:09 PMLoan Amount: 0.0088 BTCLoan Purpose: Personal Loan Repay Amount: whatever is requiredLoan Repay Date: 5/26/2023Type of Collateral: NoneEscrow profile Link: NoneBitcoin Address: bc1qf87309gn2gne85tf5wq5u4vy755hws5y6jkeadRejected, sorry.Quote from: Lbridges3001 on May 27, 2023, 11:34:19 AMQuote from: Timelord2067 on May 27, 2023, 10:50:58 AMDidn't I see you getting turned down by shasan only a day or two ago?Yes, he didn't give me a reason or anything. If you saw that he rejected my request, surely you saw my follow-up question that was never answered. It's just something that makes me feel as if I'm being janky or something. And looky here - your only NON lending post ever is in the gambling section.Since apparently you're the "gatekeeper" of this forum, you would know that the gambling section isn't my only comment or response since you can research pretty good. And what temperament? I asked again after he didn't provide any feedback. So what's your point? You don't have one. You act like I got mad and said something crazy. I get it. You just want to be negative and comment. Enjoy

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: direwolf and timelord are the beste gatekeepers of this lending section !
